attributes.action: end the practice of lobbying mp's by corporate buisiness
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the people of this country elect a government, the government are elected on the basis that they will represent the best interests of the people of this country. the best interests of the people of this country are not being represented if corporate buisiness is allowed in any way to shape or form legislation by the "lobbying" of ministers,mp's or any public servants.

rejection.details: Your petition overlaps with an existing petition which you may wish to sign instead: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/lobbying/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
